trans-unit.source: Item key, which is unique to your Decos DMS instance
Internal item type straight out of Decos DMS. Describes the context of the item. Usually a Folder/Meeting contains Documents, which has the Files they refer to attached.
Documents Import(s) which the item belongs to. A unique item can be imported from multiple exports.
Other items that contain the current item, usually with regard to the item types
Other items that are contained within the current item, usually with regard to the item types
Metadata field/data combinations, holds the metadata in any relevant field of this item
